name: Escape From Tankov (1 Hour Game Challenge)
name_original: Escape From Tankov (1 Hour Game Challenge)
description:
Using A/D or Arrow Keys dodge the missiles and get as high of a score as you can.

This project was made as part of a 1-hour game development challenge and in total took 1:50 to complete. 

20 minutes - Planning

1 hour - Developing the game

30 minutes -  Getting the game ready to be submitted on Itch (Bug Fixes/Menu Screens)
